settings.title: About JOSEF SEIBEL Group
settings.content: JOSEF SEIBEL is one of Europe's longest established shoe manufacturers. Built to the highest quality, Josef Seibel footwear offers the highest level of comfort for all day, everyday wear. Extensive, stylish ranges of shoes, boots and clogs for women and men are available through our retail stores and partners across the UK and Ireland.

settings.content_1: JOSEF SEIBEL footwear is created using a combination of high quality materials and hand-crafted elements, designed with sustainability and the perfect fit in mind. Removable insoles, genuine hand stitching and lightweight soles all provide endless comfort in every pair. High aesthetic standards and modern design come together to create a comprehensive selection of beautifully versatile footwear.
settings.content_2: JOSEF SEIBEL is proud to be the licensee for Gerry Weber Footwear worldwide. The Gerry Weber collection is elegant and extraordinary, comfortable and lightweight, offering a wide selection of shoes and boots in a variety of materials ranging from plain smooth leather and suede to textured fabrics
settings.content_3: Our new brand Westland by JOSEF SEIBEL is a comprehensive collection of lightweight, flexible and superb fitting footwear. Westland by Josef Seibel is a superb collection of high-quality footwear in a wide range of styles for the autumn/winter season. Using a combination of materials and high-tech waterproof membranes to create a perfect synergy of practicality, comfort and style.

settings.title: Tradition at Heart.
settings.content: We have been manufacturing high-quality shoes since 1886. And we continue using our knowhow to make them even better.

settings.title: Trust in Progress.
settings.content: We want to constantly evolve and find even better solutions. Which is why we are always striving for progress.

settings.title: Form of Function
settings.content: We want to be a daily companion for people. This is why function takes top priority when designing our shoes.

settings.title: Care for Detail.
settings.content: We support people, wherever their path may take them. This is why we value the quality of every single detail.

settings.title: Joy of Walking.
settings.content: We want people to live a life full of joy. Which is why we make every single step they take as comfortable as possible.

settings.title: Spirit of Nature.
settings.content: We are invested in people’s well-being in the long term. This is why we pay attention to our ecological footprint at all times.

settings.title: Our Aim of being a 100% Carbon Neutral Business by 2024
settings.content: We are taking the lead among our fashion industry peers and striving forward with our goal to be 100% carbon neutral by 2024. With our Vegan and Recycled Ranges plus our Sustainable Forest campaign, we’re well on the way.

settings.feature_collection_text: With over 20 different styles to choose from, make an ethical choice with your footware and select the next pair of JOSEF SEIBELS from our Vegan range...
